channel.title: Tutorial Standard
channel.description: Can we impose some form of tutorial standard? some form of layout that they must use? There is already more shit in there than a cess pit it would be nice if it was at least relatively nice looking? something like this [table][tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge required:[/b]various things the user must know[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge Location:[/b]links to where the user can view the information they should know[/td][/tr][/table] followed by tutorial itself Code for the above [code][table][tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge required:[/b]various things the user must know[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge Location:[/b]links to where the user can view the information they should know[/td][/tr][/table][/code] what do you think? It would make it alot nicer and any topics that dont follow the standard can be removed this will accomplish 2 things 1) make the board a possibly nice place 2) give us a chance to remove all the shitty topics that arent really worth reading

item.title: Tutorial Standard
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:7, topic:234100”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=308650.msg2467422#msg2467422 date=1222801534]

you know how many messages you will get per hour?

I get enough already. It`s not a big deal.
[/quote]
wow im gonna max you inbox out[/quote]

mods have unlimited pms, or were supposed to (mopar said he did, but it never worked when i was a mod :P)

And about the layout idea, this has been tried dozens of times in that section. Every single time it has been modified by the members to their liking, and ignored by others. And this particular layout seems over-complex to the point of incomprehension among some of the members, in my opinion. There was a much simpler version of this layout that was more understandable implemented like a year ago, but it failed like everything else in that section…

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Standard
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:3, topic:234100”][quote author=Tico135 link=topic=308650.msg2467386#msg2467386 date=1222800391]
This was my intention with the new layout. I don’t see a point in implementing something new with the new layout (hopefully) coming soon.

Besides, the tutorials by the “smarter” members usually follow this standard anyway.
[/quote]
yeah but i rage when i cant dot dumb ass idiots who post the same thing over again with no difference, if it were organised poissibly it could be forgiven but its not /RAGE[/quote]

Link them to me and I’ll deal with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Standard
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Can we impose some form of tutorial standard? some form of layout that they must use? There is already more shit in there than a cess pit it would be nice if it was at least relatively nice looking? something like this
[table][tr][td]Header:Expanded header[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]Header:Expanded header[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]Knowledge required:various things the user must know[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]Knowledge Location:links to where the user can view the information they should know[/td][/tr][/table]
followed by tutorial itself
Code for the above

[table][tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Header:[/b]Expanded header[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge required:[/b]various things the user must know[/td][/tr] [tr][td][b]Knowledge Location:[/b]links to where the user can view the information they should know[/td][/tr][/table]
what do you think? It would make it alot nicer and any topics that dont follow the standard can be removed this will accomplish 2 things 1) make the board a possibly nice place 2) give us a chance to remove all the shitty topics that arent really worth reading

Read full topic
